mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parking(spot_number, status, owner_id) VALUES(#{spotNumber}, #{status}, #{ownerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE parking SET status = #{status}, owner_id = #{ownerId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, o.name as ownerName FROM parking p LEFT JOIN owner o ON p.owner_id = o.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
